alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pointe West, or 9 miles southwest of Vero Beach South, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vero Beach, Vero Beach South, Pointe West, Grovenor Estates, and Florida Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
